JoJoMod@TheCoroboCorner.name: JoJo Mod
author: TheCoroboCorner
Monachromee
MrC33ps
JoJoMod@TheCoroboCorner.description: Adds various Stands (perhaps one may call them JoJokers) to Balatro. Please excuse the poor quality, this is my first mod.
JoJoMod@TheCoroboCorner.readme:
# JoJo Mod

This is a mod that aims to add a lot of the different Stands from JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.
Currently, there are *45* Jokers, *29* Consumables, *1* enhancement, and *1* sticker.

Textures are still incomplete for now, with most of them using placeholders, so please stay tuned for the future, and I hope you enjoy the mod!

# How to Install

You will require [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods) in order to use this mod. Instructions on [how to install Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki) are listed on their Github page.

Once that's installed, just unzip the file called "Release.zip" into your Mods folder, and you should be good to go!

(Oh, and this mod isn't compatible with the Incantation mod; it causes some issues with one of our Jokers. I'll try to fix that in the future, but for right now, if you have both, it won't work.)

Enjoy!

versionHistory.name: v0.9.4a
versionHistory.body:
**(ADDITIONS)**
- Added a great many consumable and joker textures

**(REPAIRS)**

**(MISC)**

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/TheCoroboCorner/JoJoMod/compare/v0.9.3d...v0.9.4a

**(REPAIRS)**

**(MISC)**

versionHistory.name: v0.9.3a
versionHistory.body:
**(ADDITIONS)**
- Added new textures to many Jokers and consumables
- Added three new decks to mess around with -- they're not intended to be balanced, moreso just fun, thematic decks that play with the rarer mechanics of the mod
- Added info boxes to the different Jokers to properly explain their abilities better

**(REPAIRS)**

**(MISC)**

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/TheCoroboCorner/JoJoMod/compare/v0.9.2a...v0.9.3a

versionHistory.name: v0.9.2a

- Fixed an issue where Pearl Jam was resetting to 0X Mult at the end of the hand instead of 1X Mult
- Fixed an issue where Star Platinum, The World, and The World Over Heaven were not properly getting affected by Blueprint, Brainstorm, and Moody Blues

**(MISC)**

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/TheCoroboCorner/JoJoMod/compare/v0.9.1...v0.9.2a

versionHistory.name: v0.8.0

v0.8.0 Release

Initial version of the mod -- 45 Jokers, 28 Consumables, 1 Sticker, 1 Spectral Card, and 1 Enhancement.

Textures are still incomplete, but that'll be a v1.0.0 thing.

Maximus@the-Astra.name: Maximus
author: theAstra
Maxiss02
Maximus@the-Astra.description: Maximus is a Vanilla+ mod that strives to preserve the Vanilla feel of the game (for the most part, looking at you Nuclear deck) while innovating on newer ideas to keep things fresh! Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48
Maximus@the-Astra.readme:
![Banner](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fa66aa30-60b8-44f9-9d41-5a452ca08b49)
Maximus is a Vanilla+ mod that strives to preserve the Vanilla feel of the game (for the most part, looking at you Nuclear deck) while innovating on newer ideas to keep things fresh!

Maximus currently adds the following:
- 150 Jokers
- 6 Decks
- 15 Achievements
- 12 Horoscope Cards
- 3 Spectral Cards
- 11 Planet Cards
- 10 Boss Blinds
- 15 Challenges
- 8 Vouchers
- AND MORE!!!

### THIS MOD DEPENDS ON [3xCredits](https://github.com/AuroraKy/3xCredits)! Please ensure you install this mod too!!

### [Official Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48)
Join to keep up to date with development, contributions, or just to chat with people who also enjoy the mod!

### [How to install](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)
Follow this guide and unzip the latest release of Maximus into the newly created "Mods" folder

versionHistory.name: v1.3.0-PRERELEASE-3
versionHistory.body:
# Changes
- Added better Horoscope Tag effect visibility
- Clarified Golden Rings description a bit
- Added Dummy Deck
- Made Scarred Deck visible by default
- Added JokerDisplay for Adrenaline and Apophenia (currently too lazy to do more than that)

# Fixes
- Fixed a bunch of Conspiracy cards showing nil values

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-dev.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

versionHistory.name: v1.3.0-PRERELEASE-2
versionHistory.body:
# Changes
- Reworked Conveyor Belt
  - Now excludes score given by the card
  - No longer reaches "Infinity" values with Talisman
- Gemini's hand upgrade method was updated to use the new SMODS.upgrade_poker_hands function
- Under Construction now takes up 2 Joker Slots instead of decreasing slot limit by one while in hand

# Fixes
- Fixed Refrigerator checks causing crashes sometimes

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-dev.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

## Installation

versionHistory.name: v1.2.1
versionHistory.body:
## Additions
- 4 new Challenges (Feast Fit for a King, Coexist, Speedrun, and Greedy Bastard)
- A ton of winning/losing Quips
- Maximus now properly provides OneTooManyAPI

## Changes
- Changed all scaling methods to use SMODS' new method. Allows for cross-mod compatibility for features like Group Chat and Soil Joker
- Changed Nuclear deck from using custom code to the new SMODS Operator API. Allows for less conflicts with Nuclear Deck specifically (aka you can now use Nuke Deck with Cryptid)
- Spider Joker is no longer affected by chance modifiers
- Changed many challenges to use new challenge calculation methods for better reliability
- Changed some Horoscope tags to trigger using global mod calculate methods for better reliability
- Secret Society is no longer hardcoded and will change based on the highest and lowest ranks available
- Achievements can now be unlocked on Unlock All profiles

## Fixes
- Fixed Bones Jr being able to spawn as eternal
- Fixed a ton of Black Seal related issues
- Fixed Detective not flipping cards
- Fixed eggsplosion patch
- Fixed Aeon not having an info card for Footprint

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

versionHistory.name: v1.1.7
versionHistory.body:
## Changes
- All Maximus achievements can be acquired on Unlock All profiles
- Aquarius' goal has been reduced from 10 to 6
- Scorpio can no longer appear as the first Horoscope card on the Zodiac Killer challenge
- PNGoker has been changed from Uncommon to Rare
- Reference credits have been moved to the card description from the credits badge
- Galaxy Brain's effect is handled in a much more consistent way

## Fixes
- Fixed emplaced Horoscope cards showing up as undiscovered
- Fixed Nomai credits not appearing

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

versionHistory.name: v1.1.6
versionHistory.body:
## Changes
- Sixth Finger Sleeve and Celestial Deity no longer rely on patches
- Removed 3xCredits support in favor of built-in credits system based on Cryptid's
- Added a few hover tooltips to some challenges
- The Prince now checks for polychrome face cards in hand to be in pool
- Some credits now include reference sources
- Some description clarifications

## Fixes
- Fix Zodiac Killer pools not resetting when restarting the challenge

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

## Fixes
- Fixed Jackpot showing the nil values
- Fixed Star Tag showing the incorrect card quantities for the Mega Horoscope Pack it provides
- Fixed Slippery Slope crashing from trying to index a nil poker hand
- Fixed Hypeman not using its custom trigger sound
- Fixed Pessimistic Joker causing crashes due to incorrect context index

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Fixes

versionHistory.name: v1.1.1
versionHistory.body:
## Fixes
- Black Seal no longer always affirms eternal check when present
- Fixed Pessimistic joker not working due to old variable names
- Added extra check to James to prevent edge case of performing calculations on the main menu

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

versionHistory.name: v1.1.0
versionHistory.body:
## Additions
- Destiny Deck
- CardSleeves support for every Maximus Deck (including the new Destiny Deck)
- TheFamily support
- JokerDisplay support
- 2 new Jokers (Boar Bank, Spider Joker)
- 1 new Challenge (Despite Everything)
- 1 new Achievement (Right Behind You...)
- 1 new Enhancement (Footprint)
- 1 new Tarot Card (Aeon)

## Fixes
- Pizza can no longer be Perishable
- Bear now has the correct credits
- Generated Horoscope Cards no longer appear as undiscovered
- Improved Star Tag functionality
- Fixed Maximus planet cards crashing with Cryptid
- Changed Conveyor Belt timings so the values it adds do not get overwritten
- Fixed Maximus jokers in the cashout list that change cashout value in unique ways appearing incorrectly
- Changed Screaming Joker's check to be more robust

## Changes
- Abyss Angel gain nerfed from X0.5 to X0.25
- Six Card planet cards no longer rely on deck to be in pool
- Cheat and Rule are now mutually exclusive per run
- Multiple Scale Tags will now be used every shop
- Complete rewrite for Hammer and Chisel rendering
- Changed all probability rolls to use new SMODS standardized functions
- Pessimistic Joker now works with cards from mods using new probability standards
- Black Seal now utilizes SMODS.is_eternal
- Gave Coupon events an overhaul
- A number of minor technical changes and improvements

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

- Fixed multiple "Modifiers" atlases being defined
- Fixed Gutbuster causing crashes when copied (like with Ankh)
- Fixed Taurus Level Up message persisting after Doppelganger being used

## Changes
- Much better handling of High Dive

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

## Fixes

- (Hopefully) made Severed Floor implementation more reliable

## Changes
- Gave Blackjack and Piggy Bank formatting makeovers

## Installation

versionHistory.name: v1.0.4
versionHistory.body:
## THIS UPDATE UTILIZES [3xCredits](https://github.com/AuroraKy/3xCredits)! This mod is not required, but is recommended!

## Fixes
- Fix Gutbuster edge case where it tries to destroy a nonexistant card
- Fixed some Blueprint oversights
- Fix Hurdle edge case where it tries to debuff a nonexistant card
- Fix Spare Tire assuming failed prob passes a card
- Fix Jackpot triggering prob failure with no sevens
- Fix Apocalypse Achievement being broken
- Fix Zombie causing a hard crash when turning its target

## Changes
- Removed needless loc_colours lovely patch
- Changed Who's Laughing Now achievement description
- Made Occam's Razor functionality much more clear
- Made Zombie "Turned" text a localization parameter

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

versionHistory.name: v1.0.3
versionHistory.body:
## THIS UPDATE UTILIZES [3xCredits](https://github.com/AuroraKy/3xCredits)! This mod is not required, but is recommended!

## Fixes
- Fixed incorrect Virgo reset
- Fixed Secret Society effect persisting across runs
- Fixed Hammer and Chisel not drawing card fronts when most editions are applied to card

## Changes
- Made custom global variables and contexts more identifiably unique to Maximus (sorry cross-mod compatibility friends)
- Changed Coupon functionality to trigger via context
- Changed dependent SMODS version to be equal to the most recent stable version
- Moved Maximus color implementation off of patching to storing locally

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

versionHistory.name: v1.0.2
versionHistory.body:
## THIS UPDATE UTILIZES [3xCredits](https://github.com/AuroraKy/3xCredits)! Please ensure you install this mod too!!

## Fixes
- Fixed Breadsticks Scales trying to add to a null value
- Fixed Ra not triggering destroyed card contexts
- Fixed Flame causing crashes
- Fixed Abandoned Deck having Face Cards

## Changes
- Improved Nuclear Deck implementation
- Some Horoscope Cards now award Tags for better visibility of the effect
- Nerfed Gemini by lowering level upgrade by 1 (now 2 levels for each hand)

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

versionHistory.name: v1.0.1
versionHistory.body:
## THIS UPDATE UTILIZES [3xCredits](https://github.com/AuroraKy/3xCredits)! Please ensure you install this mod too!!

## Fixes
- Fixed Stardust Crusaders Challenge crashing when viewing restrictions
- Fixed Welder/Prospector triggering at the wrong times, potentially causing multiple triggers
- Fixed a few cards crashing due to flawed Blueprint implementation
- Fixed Cleaner causing crashes on sell

## Changes
- Changed Minimalist's code organization in an attempt to fix a crash I could not recreate
- Changed some formatting for some card descriptions

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

versionHistory.name: v1.0.0
versionHistory.body:
# 1.0 IS FINALLY HERE!!! 
## THIS UPDATE UTILIZES [3xCredits](https://github.com/AuroraKy/3xCredits)! Please ensure you install this mod too!!

## Additions
Due to the sheer number of additions this update adds, I will instead list what the mod as a whole adds
- 150 Jokers
- 6 Decks
- 15 Achievements
- 12 Horoscope Cards
- 3 Spectral Cards
- 11 Planet Cards
- 10 Boss Blinds
- 15 Challenges
- 8 Vouchers
- AND MORE!!!

## Fixes
- Space Race caused crashes
- Green Joker does not scale
- Ophiucus does not have buttons when appearing in Spectral Packs

## Changes
Many Maximus Jokers have been tweaked during this time to help with balance, be they values or rarity. There are too many to list here, so feel free to find out for yourself

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

## Join the [Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48) to stay up-to-date on planned features and bug fixes!

- A few minor refactors

versionHistory.name: v0.6.0-beta
versionHistory.body:
## THIS UPDATE UTILIZES LOVELY 0.7.1 AND TALISMAN 2.1.0 FEATURES!!! PLEASE ENSURE YOU HAVE BOTH BEFORE PLAYING THIS AND FUTURE VERSIONS!!!!!!!!!!

## Additions
- Added new Jokers: PNGoker, King's Rook, Slifer the Sky Dragon, Hippie, Cheat Day, Employee, Letter of Recommendation, and Slippery Slope
- Added new Spectrals: Doppelganger and Ophiucus
- Added new Vouchers: Multitask and Workaholic
- Added Horoscope toggle config option

## Changes
- Updated art to fit with vanilla standards

## Fixes
- Fixed DMIID infinitely triggering
- Fixed custom handtypes displaying improperly with Impractical Joker
- Fixed Hypeman triggering on pack and shop cards
- Fixed crashes caused by missing dependencies

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

versionHistory.body:
## THIS UPDATE UTILIZES LOVELY 0.7.1 AND TALISMAN 2.0.2 FEATURES!!! PLEASE ENSURE YOU HAVE BOTH BEFORE PLAYING THIS AND FUTURE VERSIONS!!!!!!!!!!

## Additions
- Added High Dive Joker
- Added proper config menu
- Added Experimental Features option in config. This enables features that will be fully implemented later but are not quite finished (mostly from a card art perspective)
- Added All's Fair in Love and War challenge

## Changes
- Buffed and reworked a few challenges 
- Change Matador to only work during boss blinds (why was this not a thing?)
- Simplified stop sign implementation for vanilla jokers
- Reworked Coronation (At long last!!!)

## Fixes
- Fixed Streaker giving values of the opposite type
- Fixed Pessimistic Joker causing crashes on missed Lucky Cards
- Fixed Salt Circle causing crashes

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

grab-bag@thefaketh30ne.name: Grab Bag
author: Th30ne
grab-bag@thefaketh30ne.description: Adds 50+ new Jokers, alongside other content. (HINT: You can turn off the custom music in config.lua)
grab-bag@thefaketh30ne.readme:
# Grab Bag
Grab Bag is a Balatro mod that currently adds: 
- 46 (+8) Jokers
- 3 Tarots
- 1 Spectral
- 3 Enhancements 
- 15 Boss Blinds
- 5 Showdown Boss Blinds
- and 4 Decks.

The content in this mod is supposed to feel vanilla, and I created this new content to be largely in line with the rules and design philosophy that localthunk follows when making Jokers and other content. 

## Jokers
As of the latest update, this mod contains 21 Common, 15 Uncommon, and 10 Rare Jokers.
### Common
- Bad Trip
- Bait
- Bullseye
- Counterfeit Joker
- Coupon
- Dunce
- Gasoline
- Hadal Zone
- Jackpot
- Morose Joker
- Patience
- Postage Stamp
- Qubits
- Receipt
- Revolution 9
- Sketchy Joker
- Torchlight
- Waterfall
- Wild Joker
- Hot Potato
- Polariser
  
### Uncommon
- Another Brick
- Bank Teller
- Boing Ball
- Calculator
- Candle
- Cheque Stub
- Double Gulp
- First Strike
- Honeycomb
- Impostor
- Knight
- Lover's Locket
- Wax Joker
- Wheel of Misfortune
- Yellow Pages
  
### Rare
- Apparition
- D20
- Double King
- Forest Fire
- Golden Cookie
- Lobster Claw
- Pentagram
- Retro Joker
- Silver Hammer
- The Moon's Oceans

## Enhancements
As of the latest update, this mod contains 2 new enhancements.
- River (and The River Tarot)
- Wooden (and The Life Tarot)

## Shattered Jokers
Jokers can be shattered into more powerful Shattered jokers with the Shatter consumable, which may show up in Arcana and Spectral Packs.
### Shatterable Jokers
- Obelisk
- Flower Pot
- Fibonacci
- Polariser
- Rough Gem
- Splash
- Joker
- Invisible Joker

## Decks
There are 4 decks in the latest update of the mod.
- Gem Deck
- Mathematical Deck
- Negative Deck
- Tech Deck

Lucky-Rabbit@Trif3ctal.name: Lucky Rabbit
author: Fennex
Trif
HarmoniousJoker
Lucky-Rabbit@Trif3ctal.description: Vanilla+ content mod that adds new jokers, boss blinds, a new consumable type, and more to expand upon the base game. It's time to get silly!
Lucky-Rabbit@Trif3ctal.readme:
# Lucky Rabbit
Lucky Rabbit is a WIP Vanilla+ Balatro mod that adds new Jokers, boss blinds, a new consumable type, and more to expand upon the base game, cooked up by [Fennex](https://www.twitch.tv/mrfennex), [Trif](https://github.com/Trif3ctal), and [HarmoniousJoker](https://github.com/HarmoniousJoker). Its time to get silly!

*Note: This mod requires [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamopollys/Steamodded/archive/refs/heads/main.zip) and [Lovely](https://github.com/ethangreen-dev/lovely-injector/releases/latest) (obviously)*

As of now, this mod adds:
- **42** fun new Jokers
- **23** new Silly consumable cards
- **3** brand-new card modifiers known as **Markings**
- **2** new Enhancements to expand your deck
- **15** upgraded and helpful Vouchers
- **5** practical Decks
- **4** skip-worthy Tags
- **11** tough new Boss Blinds
- **6** themed Friends of Jimbo-style card skins

__Feel free to check out [the in-depth mod progress spreadsheet!](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-gmJJKUTY5EP2TqhpfTXqD-P1NzQQxCRvEpoFnwK72g/edit?gid=1809378509#gid=1809378509)__

*Give us feedback or notify us of issues at [the official Balatro Discord thread!](https://discord.com/channels/1116389027176787968/1342484578236895274)*
-

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/971a669a-ae21-4699-8caa-a58b7ee9748b)

Ortalab@Eremel.name: Ortalab
author: Balatro Discord
Ortalab@Eremel.description: Every action has an opposite reaction. In another world, in the nation of "Virtue", a simple indie developer created Ortalab, which so happened to be the opposite of our world's Balatro. This mod is intended to port everything from that parallel world to Balatro. Within this demo, it includes 75 Jokers, 10 Decks, 7 sets of Coupons, a new Consumable Type with Boosters - Loteria Cards, 8 Enhancements, 4 Editions, 12 patches, and 2 Stakes for you to try out.
